thread.title: Logistics Movers: USA Truck Names Nichols to Mexico Post
thread.title_full: Logistics Movers: USA Truck Names Nichols to Mexico Post - WSJ

author: Paul Page
title: Logistics Movers: USA Truck Names Nichols to Mexico Post
text:
0 COMMENTS USA Truck Inc. USAK -1.55 % named Gary Nichols vice president of Mexico operations as the trucking company said it planned to expand its operations in the country and its U.S.-Mexico cross-border services.
Mr. Nichols has spent most of his more than 35 years in the trucking industry in the U.S.-Mexico market and was director of international sales at US Xpress Inc. for the last five years.
He worked at Con-way Inc. CNW 1.06 % for 19 years before that as director of business development.
USA Truck said Nicholsâ€™ appointment is part of a broader plan to expand business in Mexico, where operators report a growing manufacturing sector is increasing trade across the border.
Write to Paul Page at paul.page@wsj.com
